name: Ping Pong Mobile
description:
An enhanced mobile port of the game Ping Pong! You can play it in your browser or download it as an app for an Android phone. This version does not support controllers or local multiplayer but has some gameplay and graphical upgrades.

Currently the app can only run on a phone running Android 11 or newer. If you have an older phone leave a comment and I can switch the app's minimum required version to Android 5.1 or newer.
